alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Fresno-Clovis; Visalia - Porterville - Reedley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 28 at 4:52PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fresno County through 530 PM PDT... At 452 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Selma, or 15 miles southeast of Fresno, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fresno, Clovis, Sanger, Reedley, Selma, Parlier, Kingsburg, Del Rey and Fowler. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
